title: Did a New York Restaurant Refuse to Serve a United States Soldier?
subtitle: Social media posts claimed Villaggio's in Massapequa, New York, shunned a military member because he visited the restaurant with a service dog.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Massapequa, New York pizza restaurant Villaggio's refused to serve a soldier named John Welch because he visited with a service dog.
